title: Google Translate gets a new “Translate Quick Actions” widget with Material You design
content:
After years of neglect, home screen widgets finally received a big facelift in Android 12. The new widgets follow Material You guidelines and are more useful, responsive, and interactive. Many popular Google apps such as Gmail, YouTube Music, Google Drive, and Maps have already received refreshed home screen widgets. Now one more Google app is

The post Google Translate gets a new “Translate Quick Actions” widget with Material You design appeared first on XDA.
description: Google Translate is getting a new Translate Quick Actions widget. It follows Material You language and supports Dynamic Color theming.
